verses.name: Genesis 29:15
verses.text: And Laban said unto Jacob, Because thou art my brother, shouldest thou therefore serve me for nought? tell me, what shall thy wages be?

verses.name: Genesis 29:16
verses.text: And Laban had two daughters: the name of the elder was Leah, and the name of the younger was Rachel.

verses.name: Genesis 29:17
verses.text: Leah was tender eyed; but Rachel was beautiful and well favoured.

verses.name: Genesis 29:18
verses.text: And Jacob loved Rachel; and said, I will serve thee seven years for Rachel thy younger daughter.

verses.name: Genesis 29:19
verses.text: And Laban said, It is better that I give her to thee, than that I should give her to another man: abide with me.
